page.title: 05Health in New Mills
page.content: New Mills has a health clinic with a chiropodist and a babies clinic. It gives good advice for mothers. It opened at the beginning of 1985. It is next to the swimming pool and it is built on St.Georges Road. New Mills also has a dentist which most people go to. It is next to the Bide A While Cafe which is on Union Road. The doctors is also popular and is on Hurst Lea Road. It also holds coffee mornings. Babies and childen can also go there. It is modern and has a treatment room for accidents.
